author: marioevz
content: Hi, I started digging into hive to try to add support for some merge tests, at least from the EL side, one thing that we might require is support for engine_* api calls in the github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/ethclient library, since it's the one used by ethereum/rpc simulator, and I took this simulator as basis to create the new tests.
